title: Shopee Store Metrics Placed Order Hourly Daily Report
description: Hourly daily report providing key metrics related to placed orders in a Shopee store

Time.description: Date and time of the report in the format 'MM-DD-YYYY HH:mm'

amount.description: Total sales amount for the specified time period in the specified currency (SGD)

currencyCode.description: Currency code for the sales amount (SGD)

Sales.description: Sales information for the specified time period

Orders.description: Total number of orders placed during the specified time period

amount.description: Average sales amount per order in the specified currency (SGD)

currencyCode.description: Currency code for the sales amount per order (SGD)

Sales_per_Order.description: Average sales amount per order information

Page_Views.description: Total number of page views during the specified time period

Visitors.description: Total number of unique visitors during the specified time period

Conversion_Rate_Placed_Orders.description: Conversion rate for placed orders as a percentage

Cancelled_Orders.description: Total number of cancelled orders during the specified time period

amount.description: Total sales amount for cancelled orders in the specified currency (SGD)

currencyCode.description: Currency code for the sales amount for cancelled orders (SGD)

Returned_Refunded_Orders.description: Total number of returned or refunded orders during the specified time period

amount.description: Total sales amount for returned or refunded orders in the specified currency (SGD)

currencyCode.description: Currency code for the sales amount for returned or refunded orders (SGD)

Returned_Refunded_Sales.description: Sales information for returned or refunded orders
